description: Choose a school of magic to which you have already applied the Spell Focus feat. Any spells you cast of this school are very hard to resist.

sections.text: Add +1 to the Difficulty Class for all saving throws against spells from the school of magic you select. This bonus stacks with the bonus from Spell Focus.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new school to which you already have applied the Spell Focus feat.
sections.name: Special

name: Greater Spell Focus
